incidents.title: Chemical Spill at Processing Plant
incidents.description: A container of hydrochloric acid was damaged during transport, resulting in a 20-gallon spill in the storage area.
incidents.resolution: Spill contained with neutralizing agent. Area cordoned off, spill team deployed with appropriate PPE. Neutralized with sodium bicarbonate solution and disposed of according to regulations.

incidents.title: Natural Gas Leak
incidents.description: A gas line was damaged during excavation work, causing a significant natural gas leak.
incidents.resolution: Area evacuated within 200 meters. Gas supply shut off. Leak repaired by utility company. No ignition occurred.

incidents.title: Diesel Fuel Spill
incidents.description: During refueling of backup generator, approximately 5 gallons of diesel fuel spilled onto concrete pad.
incidents.resolution: Spill contained with absorbent materials. No fuel reached soil or drainage. Contaminated materials properly disposed of.

incidents.title: Hydrogen Peroxide Exposure
incidents.description: Lab technician exposed to 35% hydrogen peroxide solution when container was dropped, causing splash to face and upper body.
incidents.resolution: Emergency shower used immediately. Medical assistance provided. Patient treated for chemical burns and released. Spill contained and neutralized.

incidents.title: Ammonia Release in Cold Storage
incidents.description: Refrigeration system failure led to ammonia gas release in food processing cold storage area. Five workers reported respiratory distress.
incidents.resolution: Facility evacuated. Emergency ventilation activated. Hazmat team deployed to contain leak. Affected workers received medical treatment. System repaired and tested before return to service.

incidents.title: Small Laboratory Fire
incidents.description: Electrical short in laboratory equipment caused small fire affecting workbench and adjacent materials.
incidents.resolution: Fire extinguished with CO2 extinguisher. Affected equipment isolated from power. No injuries reported. Damage limited to single workstation.

incidents.title: Sodium Metal Contact with Water
incidents.description: Small piece of sodium metal accidentally contacted water during laboratory clean-up, causing rapid reaction and small fire.
incidents.resolution: Class D fire extinguisher used to contain reaction. No injuries reported. Laboratory safety protocols reviewed and updated following incident.

incidents.title: Oxygen Cylinder Valve Leak
incidents.description: Valve on medical oxygen cylinder developed leak in hospital storage area, creating oxygen-enriched atmosphere.
incidents.location: Medical Gas Storage, Hospital Wing B
incidents.resolution: Area secured. All ignition sources eliminated. Ventilation increased. Faulty valve isolated and cylinder safely removed by certified technician.
